From Zero Code to Art App:

I tested 5 AI coding tools so you don't have to waste time & money.

Here's the breakdown of what ACTUALLY works:

formattedContent.headline: Cursor
formattedContent.content: Developer's dream IF you know the basics. Powerful, but debugging is a nightmare for beginners. Impact: Great if you're already technical, skip if not.

formattedContent.headline: Lovable
formattedContent.content: Beautiful UI, broken promises. Hit a paywall for essential map functionality. Impact: Looks good, but functionality lags. Prototype killer.

formattedContent.headline: Replit
formattedContent.content: Function over form. Not pretty, but builds working apps. Navigation, data persistence, the works. Impact: Solid choice for learning & building real stuff.

formattedContent.headline: Bolt
formattedContent.content: Avoid. Couldn't generate anything meaningful. Marketing vs. reality = massive gap. Impact: Don't waste your time.

formattedContent.headline: Base 44
formattedContent.content: The dark horse. Balanced UI & functionality. Transparent about limitations. Impact: Best overall for beginners. Honest tool-building.

formattedContent.headline: Skills Gap
formattedContent.content: "Anyone can build apps" is a lie. Most tools still need technical knowledge. Impact: Manage expectations. No magic bullet.

formattedContent.headline: Feature Completeness
formattedContent.content: Beautiful interfaces often hide limitations. Functionality beats aesthetics. Impact: Test core features FIRST.

formattedContent.headline: Honesty First
formattedContent.content: Assess your skill level. Are you a newbie or a coder? Choose accordingly. Impact: Right tool, right job.

formattedContent.headline: Define "Good Enough"
formattedContent.content: Prototype or production? Goals dictate platform choice. Impact: Don't overbuild early.

formattedContent.headline: Budget Reality
formattedContent.content: API costs, integration fees, learning curve = real costs. Impact: Factor in the hidden expenses.

formattedContent.headline: AI Coding
formattedContent.content: Democratization is happening, but slowly. Choose tools that match your needs, not aspirations. Impact: Future is coming, but not yet fully here.

formattedContent.headline: Evaluate Critically
formattedContent.content: The most valuable skill isn't coding; it's evaluating tools. Impact: Be a smart shopper. Don't believe the hype.
